rule_description: In the Object Class Program Activity file (B), the sum of all GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass must equal the total GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE in the Appropriations Account file (A).  In other words, the whole must equal the sum of its part.
rule_error_message: The GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE amount in the appropriation file (A) does not equal the sum of the corresponding GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass_CPE values in the award financial file (B).

rule_description: ObligationsIncurredTotalByTAS_CPE (File A) = sum of ObligationsIncurredByProgramObjectClass_CPE (File B)
rule_error_message: The ObligationsIncurredTotalByTAS_CPE amount in the appropriation file (A) does not equal the sum of the corresponding ObligationsIncurredByProgramObjectClass_CPE values in the award financial file (B).

rule_description: ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB) must equal the sum of: USSGL480100_UndeliveredOrdersObligationsUnpaid_FYB, USSGL483100_UndeliveredOrdersObligationsTransferredUnpaid_CPE, USSGL487100_DownwardAdjustmentsOfPriorYearUnpaidUndeliveredOrdersObligationsRecoveries_CPE, and USSGL498100_UpwardAdjustmentsOfPriorYearDeliveredOrdersObligationsUnpaid_CPE. This applies to the program activity and object class level.
rule_error_message: Failed rule: ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4801 + 4831 + 4871 + 4881). This applies to the program activity and object class level.

rule_description: GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file) must equal the sum of GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file) and GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file).
rule_error_message: Failed rule: GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (FYB or CPE, File B) = GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File B) + GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File B)

rule_description: GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file) must equal the sum of GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file) and GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE, Object Class Program Activity file).

rule_description: Must be valid 3-digit object class as defined in OMB Circular A-11 Section 83.6, or a 4-digit code which includes a 1-digit prefix that distinguishes direct, reimbursable, and allocation obligations. Do not include decimal points when reporting in the Schema.
rule_error_message: Failed rule: Must be valid 3-digit object class as defined in OMB Circular A-11 Section 83.6, or a 4-digit code which includes a 1-digit prefix that distinguishes direct, reimbursable, and allocation obligations. Do not include decimal points when reporting in the Schema.

rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".

rule_description: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
rule_error_message: The reimbursable flag indicator (bydirectreimbursablefundingsource) must be empty, R, or D
